Posts.Content: DiamondGurl wrote: Has anyone been diagnose with breast cancer in just one breast but has decided to have a bilateral mastectomy without getting tested for the BRCA gene? I am 24, and I have decided to removed both breast. I have not gotten tested for the gene yet. But I think is better to remove both, I dont want to ever again deal with this again.
